title: The Scandalous 2020 Election And 2000 Mules Are Back In The News (Ep 1842)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest attack on Trump using the useful idiots in the media. Also, a serious warning about what the FBI could be up to. Also, I give an update on the election scandal exposed in the movie 2000 Mules. 

News Picks:

The FBI agent accused of partisanship speaks out through his lawyer.

The Democrats can’t hide their interference in the 2020 election anymore.

Convenient timing! The FTC is cracking down on cell phone location data right before an election. 


Senators demand Facebook turn over critical information about Hunter Biden communications.

Google’s never ending war on conservatives continues.


Gun Makers Abandoning Anti-Second Amendment States.
